name: Reach the light
description:
"Reach the light" is a precision platformer where you climb the biggest mountain in the world to be forgiven...

Features

  • BIG mountain to climb which time depends on your ability
  • Multiple platforms with tricky behaviors.
  • Tons of NPCs to talk.
  • Ball customization.
  • Vast map and places to explore.
  • Checkpoints difficult to obtain.
  • Exclusive badges in the game for reaching the light.

Gameplay

Use two jumps that are recharged over time to climb the mountain. It is a challenge to maintain balance and make accurate jumps on platforms.
Fortunately in certain parts of the mountain, strange individuals will remember your presence in case you fall. You should use them with care as there aren't many...

Lore

Jump and climb the biggest mountain ever known made by "The Creator", and with the help of other creatures you may be able to reach the light.
Asking for forgiveness is a difficult task that you may not be able to achieve, a challenge like climbing this mountain...
Good luck and may fate be on your side...
